alert.note: Alert for Kinney; Maverick; Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 4:19PM CST until January 08 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Val Verde, Kinney and Maverick Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 8 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
